entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
